query:
SELECT 
  avt.id as video_task_id,
  avt.highlight_id,
  avt.error_message,
  avt.created_at as video_task_created,
  ph.title as highlight_title,
  ph.duration as highlight_duration,
  ph.audio_url,
  pt.id as podcast_task_id,
  pt.title as podcast_title,
  pt.youtube_url
FROM avatar_video_tasks avt
LEFT JOIN podcast_highlights ph ON avt.highlight_id = ph.id
LEFT JOIN podcast_tasks pt ON avt.task_id = pt.id
WHERE avt.status = 'failed'
ORDER BY avt.created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;

  ph.title as highlight_title,
  ph.duration as highlight_duration,
  ph.audio_url,
  pt.id as podcast_task_id,
  pt.title as podcast_title,
  pt.youtube_url
FROM avatar_video_tasks avt
LEFT JOIN podcast_highlights ph ON avt.highlight_id = ph.id
LEFT JOIN podcast_tasks pt ON avt.task_id = pt.id
WHERE avt.status = 'failed'
ORDER BY avt.created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;
